head.title: The Direct Project: SMTP MQ Gateway

section.name: Overview
section.p: The NHIN Direct SMTP MQ module consists is the inbound SMTP interface for the DirectProject Java RI microservices architecture. It accepts inbound messages and forwards them the security and trust agent module via a Spring Cloud streams channel. It support message size limits and the ability filter incoming messages by CIDR ranges.
